posts.post_content:
Probably a pipe dream, but if is anyone is interested in trading a T214, M131, E92 Nadja Evers or possibly other tough Evers cards, I have the following T206's for trade.
Also this link has other cards available. [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/fortrade[/url]

Let me know if you anything to trade. [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Here are the T206's for trade(only). Click on image for bigger scan.

[URL=http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/huge/T206%20Evers%20Hindu%20blue%20sky.jpg][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/icons/T206%20Evers%20Hindu%20blue%20sky.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/huge/T206%20Evers%20Hindu%20portrait.jpg][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/icons/T206%20Evers%20Hindu%20portrait.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/huge/T206%20Evers%20Broad%20Leaf%20350.jpg][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/icons/T206%20Evers%20Broad%20Leaf%20350.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/huge/T206%20Evers%20Sovereign%20460.jpg][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/johnnyeverscards/frontbackofmyeverscards/icons/T206%20Evers%20Sovereign%20460.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Great stuff Mike. Good luck with the trading.
Thanks for the kind words, Chris and Adam. Mike
Wow! Those are amazing :) best of luck!
